EINSTEIN PERSONALIZATION
Install Einstein Personalization Data Kit and Components

To assist with Data Cloud setup, install the Einstein Personalization data kit that and use it to create and deploy some of the required components. Before you can use the data kit, you must first install it into your Data Cloud org. You can install the data kit from AppExchange or using a URL.

Data Kit Contents
The Einstein Personalization data kit wraps around packageable Data Cloud metadata to assist you in setting up Data Cloud for use with the Einstein Personalization app. However, the data kit doesn’t install everything necessary to set up Data Cloud to work with Einstein Personalization.
Install Einstein Personalization Data Kit from AppExchange
The Einstein Personalization data kit is stored on AppExchange as a managed package. Install the managed package, and then configure it for your environment and users.
